```{r}
library(ggplot2)
data(mtcars)
#head(mtcars)
dotchart(mtcars$mpg,labels=row.names(mtcars),cex=.7)

hist(mtcars$mpg, xlab="Miles per gallon", breaks=12, col = c("blue", "red", "gray", "green")) 

boxplot(mpg~am, data = mtcars, col = c("blue", "blue"), xlab = "Transmission", ylab = "Miles per Gallon", main = "MPG by Transmission Type")

boxplot(mpg~cyl, data = mtcars, col = c("red"), xlab = "Cylinders", ylab = "Miles per Gallon", main = "MPG by Number of Cylinders")

#THIS
aggregate(mpg ~ am, data = mtcars, mean)

aggregate(mpg ~ cyl, data = mtcars, mean)
#==================================
#OR
fit <- lm(mpg~am, data = mtcars)
summary(fit)

fit <- lm(mpg~cyl, data = mtcars)
summary(fit)
```
